title: Europe Seeks Exemption From U.S. Rules on EV Tax Breaks
description:
A.M. Edition for Nov. 4. U.S. and EU officials are set to hold an urgent meeting today to defuse rising tensions that threaten to upset a trade relationship that leaders had pledged to rebuild. WSJ reporter Kim Mackrael explains why U.S. clean-technology subsidies have EU officials and business leaders on edge. Luke Vargas hosts. 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
